Name: Merus Labs International Inc
Description: DELISTED - Merus Labs International Inc., a specialty pharmaceutical company, engages in the acquisition and licensing of prescription medicines in the United States, Canada, and Europe. The company offers Emselex/Enablex, a muscarinic antagonist indicated for the treatment of overactive bladder with symptoms of urge urinary incontinence, urgency, and frequency; Sintrom, an anti-coagulant drug for the treatment and prevention of clotting disorders like thromboembolism diseases; and Vancocin, an antibiotic used to treat diseases resulting from the infection of Clostridium Difficile. Its customers include national wholesalers, physicians and allied health professionals, patients and their families/caregivers, managed care organizations and group purchasing organizations, and state and federal government health agencies. The company is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
